title: The Mists of Pandaria Classic Beta is Coming
description: We’re still stuck in the seemingly endless wait for the end of Cataclysm Classic.  May 20th will mark the one year anniversary of its launch, which will put it about six months past its prime.  Meanwhile, the WoW Classic 2025 roadmap put the launch of Mists of Pandaria Classic out in autumn.  Why does Blizzard […]
author: Wilhelm Arcturus
excerpt: We’re still stuck in the seemingly endless wait for the end of Cataclysm Classic. May 20th will mark the one year anniversary of its launch, which will put it about six months past its prime…
text: We’re still stuck in the seemingly endless wait for the end of Cataclysm Classic.  May 20th will mark the one year anniversary of its launch, which will put it about six months past its prime.  Meanwhile, the WoW Classic 2025 roadmap put the launch of Mists of Pandaria Classic out in autumn.  Why does Blizzard hate us so? Blizzard WoW Classic 2025 Roadmap Unlike vanilla, or even the previous two expansions, Cataclysm just doesn’t have that much content.  Or such is my opinion.  I am sure there is somebody out there to champion the expansion, someone who hopes it will never end.  But that is clearly not me. But, slow though it may be, Mists of Pandaria is coming.  Blizzard put up a news item announcing that you can sign up to join the beta for the re-release of the expansion in classic form. Pandas are Coming The announcement does not actually SAY when the beta will commence, just that you can sign up for it now. It does, however, included a footnote at the bottom, once the piece gets done trying to get you to buy some level boosters and other cash shop items, that says the expansion will launch on or before August 31, 2025.  I mean, we knew that already, but still… it is nice to be reminded that there is a light at the end of the tunnel somewhere. So take that for whatever value you care to assign it.  Assuming the pre-patch will land at least four weeks ahead of the opening of the expansion, we should have to endure no more than another four months of Cataclysm Classic. Related: Blizz – Sign Up for the Mists of Pandaria Classic Beta Today!
html:
We’re still stuck in the seemingly endless wait for the end of Cataclysm Classic.  May 20th will mark the one year anniversary of its launch, which will put it about six months past its prime.  Meanwhile, the WoW Classic 2025 roadmap put the launch of Mists of Pandaria Classic out in autumn.  Why does Blizzard hate us so?

Blizzard WoW Classic 2025 Roadmap

Unlike vanilla, or even the previous two expansions, Cataclysm just doesn’t have that much content.  Or such is my opinion.  I am sure there is somebody out there to champion the expansion, someone who hopes it will never end.  But that is clearly not me.

But, slow though it may be, Mists of Pandaria is coming.  Blizzard put up a news item announcing that you can sign up to join the beta for the re-release of the expansion in classic form.

Pandas are Coming

The announcement does not actually SAY when the beta will commence, just that you can sign up for it now.

It does, however, included a footnote at the bottom, once the piece gets done trying to get you to buy some level boosters and other cash shop items, that says the expansion will launch on or before August 31, 2025.  I mean, we knew that already, but still… it is nice to be reminded that there is a light at the end of the tunnel somewhere.

So take that for whatever value you care to assign it.  Assuming the pre-patch will land at least four weeks ahead of the opening of the expansion, we should have to endure no more than another four months of Cataclysm Classic.

Related:

  • Blizz – Sign Up for the Mists of Pandaria Classic Beta Today!
